question: Identify the top 5 companies in the technology sector by revenue and their associated social media metrics.

subtasks.task: Retrieve the list of companies in the technology (IT) sector and their revenues.
Sort the companies by revenue in descending order and limit the results to the top 5 companies.
Fetch the social media metrics (e.g., likes, comments, engagement rates) of the top 5 companies from relevant social media tables (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube).
Aggregate the social media metrics data for the top 5 companies to provide a summary of their social media performance.
